name: Under Rail
description:
You are the sole survivor of a tragic and paranormal train accident.  You've woken in some kind of underworld where your only hope of escape is to help the demon Unomos.  Can you decipher his cryptic messages to find a way home?  And if so, at what cost?

Under Rail was developed for the Themed Horror Game Jam #9 - Halloween Edition.

The game is playable in browser, but we recommended playing the downloadable version of the game, as this format was the focus of development and testing. If the game seems too dark, try using the brightness setting within the pause menu, which can be accessed using P or Esc. All controls for the game are in the pause menu.
